response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the significant impact it can have on your endeavors, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,050,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to acquire this remarkable asset at a premium discount, ensuring you maximize your investment's value. Should you decide to accept this offer, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction without delay. If you need more information or have any questions, feel free to reach out to me. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1050000}
